about_the_game:
A minimalist roguelike take on Minesweeper. Advance deeper into hazardous minefields, gaining valuable knowledge (and upgrades!) to outplay a diverse array of mines and structures.

Features

35+ Mines & Structures to encounter, from the radar-befuddling Wave Mine, to the tile-blocking Void Caster, to the all-powerful Ultimine.

50+ Upgrades to choose from - reveal tiles, disarm mines, and enhance your probes to give yourself the upper hand.

5+ Consoles to start a run with, each having its own tricks and upgrade slot configurations while staying true to the base gameplay.

Highly customizable difficulty system that encourages trying new configurations.

20-40 minute runs that respect your time, adding new elements almost every level.

Continue runs in Endless Mode after winning and try for a high score.

short_description: A rapidly escalating Minesweeper-inspired roguelike. Gain upgrades, discover new mines, and progress further based on understanding and strategy. Can you avoid running out of probes and clear all the minefields?
